novice

Class NedFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • novice.NedFile

  • public class NedFile
extends java.lang.Object
    The NedFile Object.

    Tools for defining the properties of a National Elevation Database (NED) file.

    Since:
    April 13, 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NedFile(java.io.File f, int n, int w)
      Instantiates a new NED File.
